structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIII(S). NORTH CENTRAL URBAN AREA DISTRICT (NCUAD)

law.catch_line: North Central Urban Area District (NCUAD) Requirements.

text.section:
Sec. 33-284.99.49. North Central Urban Area District (NCUAD) Requirements.
Except as provided herein, all developments within the NCUAD shall comply with the requirements provided in Article XXXIII(K), Standard Urban Center District Regulations, of this chapter.
